about.title: We think details are important, that why we always go the extra mile

description.paragraph1: We transform ordinary spaces into extraordinary places that inspire and bring comfort.
description.paragraph2Full: With a team of passionate specialists and a creative approach, we have completed thousands of projects for clients from Romania and abroad.
description.paragraph2Short: With passionate specialists and creative approach, we've completed thousands of projects for clients worldwide.
description.paragraph3: Each project is a combination of functionality, aesthetics, and personality – so that the final result is truly yours.

bottom.title: We combine creativity with functionality in every project

projects.title: More than beautiful – functional and personal

bio.paragraph1: As founder of the Urban chain in the 90s, Alf Richard Bjerkøen began designing and building his own shops. Urban was later acquired by the Varner Group.
bio.paragraph2: Shopdesign was in the 2000s established to design and build stores for other players.
bio.paragraph3: Since 2016, Shopdesign has developed a new interior design system in collaboration with engineers and designers in Italy, so-called PluggInWall System. PluggInWall System is now fully developed and ready to be produced at our partner in Italy.

footer.tagline: We transform spaces into places that inspire – since 2017.
footer.copyright: © 2025 All rights reserved. Created by Quant-Apps.

main.title: We design your dream space
main.description: We transform every room into a place where you feel inspired and comfortable.

list.title: Interior Design
list.description: We create unique interiors for shops, commercial spaces, apartments, camper vans, and cabins. Every project is designed with style, functionality, and atmosphere in mind — making your space work for your business or feel like home.

list.title: Consultancy & Project Management
list.description: Providing expert consultancy, project planning, and full execution support to ensure your vision comes to life seamlessly.

list.title: Plug in wall System
list.description: A versatile plug-in wall system, ideal for quick and flexible installations. Panels can be easily mounted without special tools, offering a modular design adaptable to any commercial, exhibition, or residential space. Ensures stability, durability, and a modern aesthetic.

contactForm.title: Creative Project?
contactForm.subtitle: Let's have a productive discussion.

services.designInterior: Design interior for shops, commercial, apartments, camping cars, cabins
